title: Gauge Independent Critical Exponents for QED Coupled to a Four Fermi Interaction with and without a Chern Simons Term
abstract: We apply the self consistency method for determining critical exponents to a model with a four fermi interaction coupled to QED and compute various gauge independent exponents in arbitrary dimensions in the large $N$ expansion at $O(1/N)$. The formalism is developed to include a Chern Simons term in three dimensions and the effect such a term has on the exponents is deduced.
